channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: BBCは「クリエイティブ・ダイバーシティ・コミットメント」のもと、テレビとラジオのコンテンツに1億2850万ポンドを投資し、3年間の目標であった1億ポンドを1年で達成した（Naman Ramachandran/Variety）
item.description:
Naman Ramachandran / Variety:
The BBC invested £128.5M into TV and radio content under its Creative Diversity Commitment, hitting its £100M three-year goal with one year to spare  —  The BBC invested £128.5 million ($165.7 million) into TV and radio content in the first two years of its Creative Diversity Commitment, a year ahead of target.

item.title: アマゾンのクラブハウス・ライバルであるAmpの苦闘の詳細が文書で明らかになった。
item.description:
Kyle Wiggers / TechCrunch:
Documents detail the struggles of Amazon's Clubhouse rival Amp, launched in March 2022 with a year-end target of 1M+ MAUs; a source says MAUs sit at 700K today  —  At the height of the COVID-19 health crisis, when many of us — forced by quarantine rules and social distancing guidelines …

item.title: 情報源英上場オンライン小売業者THGが、今月売りに出されたロンドンの経済紙City AMの買収交渉中。
item.description:
Financial Times:
Sources: UK-listed online retailer THG is in talks to acquire London business newspaper City AM, which was put up for sale this month; City AM employs ~40 staff  —  Acquisition would mark a departure for London-listed ecommerce group  —  Matt Moulding's online retailer THG is in talks …

item.title: 情報筋：音楽著作権会社BMIが売却を含む選択肢を再び模索中、BMIは2021年に身売りに失敗した後、2022年に営利モデルに転換（ロイター）
item.description:
Reuters:
Sources: music rights company BMI is again exploring options including a sale; BMI switched to a for-profit model in 2022 after failing to sell itself in 2021  —  Broadcast Music Inc (BMI), the music rights company representing top songwriters such as Lady Gaga, Taylor Swift and Rihanna …

item.title: グーグルによると、YouTube Shortsを視聴している月間ログインユーザー数は2022年6月の15億人以上から2億人以上に増加し、YouTubeは米国で1億5000万人にテレビでリーチしている（Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Ivan Mehta / TechCrunch:
Google says 2B+ logged-in monthly users are watching YouTube Shorts, up from 1.5B+ in June 2022, and YouTube is reaching 150M people on their TVs in the US  —  Google said today that more than 2 billion logged-in monthly users are watching YouTube Shorts, giving it an edge over competitors like TikTok and Instagram Reels.

item.title: 2023年5月8日、ジャーナリストのティモシー・バークの自宅を捜索した際、当局が不正アクセス犯罪の証拠を探していたことが文書で判明（マシュー・キーズ／デスク）
item.description:
Matthew Keys / The Desk:
Documents show that authorities sought evidence of alleged criminal unauthorized computer access when searching journalist Timothy Burke's home on May 8, 2023  —  A search warrant obtained by The Desk shows federal investigators are looking into an alleged cyber intrusion scheme involving former Deadspin editor Timothy Burke.

item.title: メタは、フェイスブックやインスタグラムとは異なり、スレッド上ではロシアや他の権威主義的な政府からの国家支援メディアのプロパガンダ・アカウントにラベルを貼っていない（Newley Purnell/Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Newley Purnell / Wall Street Journal:
Meta hasn't labeled propaganda accounts of state-backed media from Russia and other authoritarian governments on Threads, unlike on Facebook and Instagram  —  State-backed media accounts have hundreds of thousands of followers without the labels they are made to carry on Instagram and Facebook

item.title: スタンド・ウィズ・プロダクションと呼ばれるグループによって組織された約5,000人のテレビCM制作労働者の過半数が、IATSE組合への加入を求めるカードに署名（The Hollywood Reporter紙）
item.description:
The Hollywood Reporter:
A majority of around 5,000 TV commercial production workers, organized by a group called Stand With Production, signs cards seeking to join the IATSE union  —  The group, titled Stand With Production, comprises an estimated 5,000 TV workers, a majority of whom have signaled their support …

item.title: シカゴ・カブスとシンクレアの合弁会社マーキー・スポーツ・ネットワークが、月額19.99ドルでシカゴ地区のカブス戦などを生中継するストリーミング・アプリを開始（Jon Lafayette/Next TV）
item.description:
Jon Lafayette / Next TV:
Marquee Sports Network, a Chicago Cubs and Sinclair joint venture, launches a streaming app with live Cubs games and more in the Chicago area, for $19.99/month  —  Subscription costs $19.99 a month  —  Marquee Sports Network, the regional sports network joint venture of the Chicago Cubs and Sinclair …

item.title: スポティファイのダニエル・エクCEO、ポッドキャストの要約や音声広告の生成など、同社製品にAIを追加統合する方法を予告（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
Spotify CEO Daniel Ek teases ways the company could integrate additional AI into its products, including summarizing podcasts and generating audio ads  —  During the company's second-quarter earnings call this morning, Spotify CEO Daniel Ek teased a few ways the streaming service could introduce additional AI-powered functionality.

item.title: BBCが女子ワールドカップ開幕戦での記者の "不適切 "な質問について謝罪、記者はモロッコのキャプテンにゲイの選手がいるのかと質問した（Matias Grez/CNN）
item.description:
Matias Grez / CNN:
The BBC apologizes for a reporter's “inappropriate” question at the Women's World Cup opener; the reporter asked Morocco's captain if the team had gay players  —  Women's World Cup 2023: Live scores, fixtures, results, tables and top scorers  —  The BBC has apologized for an …

item.title: メール：Xは米国と英国で新しい動画広告のディスカウントを提供し、広告主には支出額に達しない限り検証済みステータスを失うと警告している（ウォール・ストリート・ジャーナル）。
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Emails: X offers discounts on new video ads in the US and UK and warns advertisers that they will lose verified status unless they reach spending thresholds  —  Social-media site X is offering hefty discounts to lure back ad dollars  —  X Corp. is cutting ad prices as it tries to woo brands back to the Elon Musk-owned platform.

item.title: アルファベット、第2四半期のグーグル広告売上は前年同期比3％増の581億4000万ドル 2四半期連続の広告売上減の後（Miles Kruppa/Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Miles Kruppa / Wall Street Journal:
Alphabet reports Q2 Google ad revenue up 3% YoY to $58.14B after two consecutive quarters of falling ad sales  —  Financial chief Ruth Porat to become Alphabet's president and chief investment officer  —  Google reported a pickup in revenue growth during the most recent quarter …

item.title: YouTubeの第2四半期の広告収入は前年同期比4.4％増の76.7億ドル、予想の74.3億ドルを上回り、3四半期連続の減少から一転（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
YouTube's ad revenue increased 4.4% YoY to $7.67B in Q2, above expectations of $7.43B and a reversal after three consecutive quarters of declines  —  Alphabet, the parent company of Google and YouTube, came in above analyst earnings expectations, with top-line growth of 7%.

item.title: スナップ、第2四半期売上高は前年同期比4%減の$1.07B、予想$1.05B、DAUは前年同期比14%増の39.7M、予想$3.95M、第3四半期売上高予想は予想を下回る、SNAPは16%以上下落（Jonathan Vanian/CNBC）
item.description:
Jonathan Vanian / CNBC:
Snap reports Q2 revenue down 4% YoY to $1.07B, vs. $1.05B est., DAUs up 14% YoY to 397M, vs. 395M est., and Q3 revenue forecast below est.; SNAP drops 16%+  —  - Snap's overall sales in the second quarter declined 4% from the $1.11 billion it logged in the previous year during the same period.
